alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 9:39PM MDT until October 24 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and strong winds. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. North and northwest winds gusting 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Johnson County and Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and strong cross winds. Snow plus strong winds are likely to cause periods of low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
